LanguageData.RC2_VegetableJuice.label: vegetable juice
LanguageData.RC2_VegetableJuice.description: A tasty drink made from squeezing one or more vegetables. Tasty and healthy, but not very filling.
LanguageData.RC2_Eggnog.label: eggnog
LanguageData.RC2_Eggnog.description: A tasty drink made from a combination of eggs, milk, and sweeteners. Great during the holidays!
LanguageData.RC2_TonicSoda.label: tonic soda
LanguageData.RC2_TonicSoda.description: A tasty drink made from water and sweeteners. Carbonated and sweet, but little flavor.
LanguageData.RC2_LiquidCheese.label: RimCo Liquid Cheese
LanguageData.RC2_LiquidCheese.description: This delicious drink is made with 100% real cheese! Enjoy it on the go, during a meal, or whenever, this cheesy delight will brighten your day. Comes in Sharp Cheddar, Bacon Ranch Cheddar, Smokey Gouda, Baby White, and Limburger! Brought to you by RimCo., the makers of Rim-Cola!
LanguageData.RC2_FruitSoda.label: fruit soda
LanguageData.RC2_FruitSoda.description: A tasty drink made from water, fruit, and sweeteners. Comes in a wide variety of flavors!
LanguageData.RC2_HotCocoa.label: hot cocoa
LanguageData.RC2_HotCocoa.description: A tasty drink made from milk and cocoa. Keeps you warm in wintery nights!
LanguageData.RC2_IcedTea.label: iced tea
LanguageData.RC2_IcedTea.description: A refreshing drink made from tea leaves, sugar, and fruit, usually citrus but others work too. Keeps you cool on hot days!
LanguageData.RC2_EnergyDrink.label: energy drink
LanguageData.RC2_EnergyDrink.description: A sugary, often tangy drink made from excessive amounts of sugar, coffee and some fruit to taste. Very high amounts of caffeine, don't drink too many of these!
